name: Boocas
subtitle: A modern, digital approach to creating a bookclub
summary: Boocas was created a final Project at IRONHACK. As a team of three we developed this online bookclub from scratch in roughly 9 Days. Boccas won as the 1th place for final projects.

name: speakEasy
subtitle: Find and create Language Tandems with people from your area or all over the world!
summary: speakEasy was the second Project I did during IRONHACK in a Team of two. It is created as a fullstack express Application, using hbs.

name: andrewittwer.de
summary: A simple React Single Page Application I builded right after the bootcamp for my own website.
